main event: On August 21, 1958, a single unidentified flying object was observed moving across the sky from the northeast to the southwest in Kansas City, Kansas.
interesting points: The object was witnessed moving for about 45 seconds., The object was reported to leave a trail and flash lights, seemingly signaling to other aircraft., A B-47 aircraft was reported to have been flying in the same area at the time., Multiple reports from nearby citizens noted similar sightings of unexplained lights and objects in the sky., The weather was clear, providing good visibility for the observation.
witness description: citizens in the area, including a housewife and a major in the USAF
